TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ContentControlContentUpdatingEventArgs

summary.span: 为内容控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a content control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含名为`plainTextContentControl1`，它绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md). 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C# 中，你必须还将附加到的事件处理程序和的事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置正从绑定到控件的自定义 XML 部件写入到内容控件的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is being written to the content control from the custom XML part that is bound to the control.

value.span: 正从绑定到控件的自定义 XML 部件写入到内容控件的文本。

span.span: The text that is being written to the content control from the custom XML part that is bound to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将内容控件绑定到一种 XML 中的元素 (也名为*自定义 XML 部件*) 嵌入在文档中。You can bind content controls to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 使用属性可以在 Microsoft Office Word 更新控件之前更改文本。Use the property to change the text before Microsoft Office Word updates the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含名为`plainTextContentControl1`，它绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md). 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C# 中，你必须还将附加到的事件处理程序和的事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 你可以修改其在应用程序级外接程序中运行。You can modify it to run in an application-level add-in. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]
